context.p: The number of widgets that users can add to a tab depends on the tab page layout. Once the number of widgets exceeds the maximum number the tab page can accomodate, users must remove a widget from the tab page or create a new tab for the widget.

step.cmd: Go to Dashboard in the navigation at the top of the web console.
Go to the tab (Summary or System under the Dashboard) that you want to add the widget to.
Click the Add Widgets button at the right side, and then the screen for widget adding appears.
Click the checkbox(es) next to the widget names to add one or more widgets to the current tab.
Click the Add button to complete the task.
